name: express-routing-exercises
description: - [ ] set up get request for /mean - [ ] set up get request for /median - [ ] set up get request for /mode - [ ] return json for /mean - [ ] return json for /median - [ ] return json for /mode - [ ] handle NaN errors. For instance, /mean?nums=foo,2,3 should respond with a 400 Bad Request status code and a response that saying something like: foo is not a number. - [ ] handle empty input: /mean without passing any nums should respond with a 400 Bad Request status code saying something like nums are required. - [ ] make sure you have unit tests for mean, median and mode.
